programlisting:
# Disable magic quotes php_value magic_quotes_gpc 0 php_value magic_quotes_runtime 0 php_value magic_quotes_sybase 0
# Disabled registering of globals and arg* php_value register_globals 0 php_value register_argc_argv 0
# Disallow some security holes php_value allow_call_time_pass_reference 0 php_value allow_url_fopen 0 php_flag short_open_tag Off php_flag enable_dl Off
# Gzip compress the output php_flag output_buffering Off php_flag zlib.output_compression On
